sn37.3:1.1: “Pancimani, bhikkhave, matugamassa avenikani dukkhani, yani matugamo paccanubhoti, annatreva purisehi.
sn37.3:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, matugamo daharova samano patikulam gacchati, natakehi vina hoti.
sn37.3:1.4: Idam, bhikkhave, matugamassa pathamam avenikam dukkham, yam matugamo paccanubhoti, annatreva purisehi.
sn37.3:1.5: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, matugamo utuni hoti.
sn37.3:1.6: Idam, bhikkhave, matugamassa dutiyam avenikam dukkham, yam matugamo paccanubhoti, annatreva purisehi.
sn37.3:1.7: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, matugamo gabbhini hoti.
sn37.3:1.8: Idam, bhikkhave, matugamassa tatiyam avenikam dukkham, yam matugamo paccanubhoti, annatreva purisehi.
sn37.3:1.10: Idam, bhikkhave, matugamassa catuttham avenikam dukkham, yam matugamo paccanubhoti, annatreva purisehi.
sn37.3:1.11: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, matugamo purisassa paricariyam upeti.
sn37.3:1.12: Idam kho, bhikkhave, matugamassa pancamam avenikam dukkham, yam matugamo paccanubhoti, annatreva purisehi.
sn37.3:1.13: Imani kho, bhikkhave, panca matugamassa avenikani dukkhani, yani matugamo paccanubhoti, annatreva purisehi”ti.
